text: phir usake bhaee kee khurajee se pahale unakee khurajiyaan dekhanee shuroo kee; phir usake bhaee kee khurajee se use baraamad kar liya. is prakaar hamane yoosuf ka upaay kiya. vah shaahee qaanoon ke anusaar apane bhaee ko praapt nahin kar sakata tha. balki allaah hee kee ichchha laagoo hai. ham jisako chaahe usake darje oonche kar den. aur pratyek gyaanavaan se oopar ek gyaanavaan maujood hai
